channel.title: global on R-Ladies Global
channel.description: Recent content in global on R-Ladies Global

item.title: Global Team Recruiting
item.description: Photo by Hannah Busing on Unsplash. Alt text: Image of arms and hands of women wearing colorful sweaters in a circle with hands piled together. TL; DR The R-Ladies Global Team is recruiting new members!

item.title: Global Leadership Team Transition
item.description: R-Ladies first began as a meet-up in 2012, and became a global organization in 2016. Since inception, the R-Ladies Global organization has been run on 100% volunteer effort from individuals and chapters throughout the world.
